description: For these quesadillas, I prefer to use my own cooked black beans, which I try to keep on hand in the freezer Canned baked beans are also an option, but they are higher in sodium than home-cooked beans.
title: Black Bean and Goat Cheese Quesadillas
title_page: Black Bean and Goat Cheese Quesadillas Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
For these quesadillas, I prefer to use my own cooked black beans, which I try to keep on hand in the freezer. Canned baked beans are also an option, but they are higher in sodium than home-cooked beans.
Featured in: Fast Food For Harried Days.
